## TWizardInteraction type

An interaction event emitted by the Wizard component. The payload is either proxied from the Form component rendered in the primary area as the active step, or is triggered when the user interacts with any step listed in the sidebar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TWizardInteraction = TFormInteraction | IWizardSidebarInteraction;
```
<b>References:</b> [TFormInteraction](./react-teams.tforminteraction.md)<!-- -->, [IWizardSidebarInteraction](./react-teams.iwizardsidebarinteraction.md)
